random.line: Whose got more money. Me or you? I bet a million it's me.
I look so dapper in this suit.
Would any lady care to dance with the man who runs the stock market?
If you don't have money, get out of my sight.
The food provided is subpar. My lobster is too small and has too much gooey stuff on it!
I'm so full, I'm ready to puke.
I'm almost out of #500 bills! Better run to the bank soon.
My suit suits me well, eh? Eh?
I will not eat this fruitcake if it doesn't have any saffron in it!
